96.eng-name: Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The people of the Book used to read the Torah in Hebrew and then explain it in Arabic to the Muslims. Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said (to the Muslims). "Do not believe the people of the Book, nor disbelieve them, but say, 'We believe in Allah and whatever is revealed to us, and whatever is revealed to you

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " لاَ تَسْأَلُوا أَهْلَ الْكِتَابِ عَنْ شَىْءٍ "
chapter.eng-name: “Do not ask the people of the Scripture about anything.”
